== Roadmap ==

Currently we offer services like:

*** Web site (http://www.ubuntu-at.com/) with a highly active user forum offering all sorts of support, quick start how-tos and hands on help
*** Regular user meetings in the capital of Austria Vienna.
*** Regular kick start presentations and hands on seminars (including Installation parties)
*** Co-operation with local and domestic user groups
*** Support for local, non-viennese user meetings
*** Strong ties to local representatives of the software industry (IBM, HP, Novell, to name but a few)

Our next steps are:

*** Provide preinstalled hardware
*** Maintain a stronger presence at local and domestic computer fares
*** Increase awareness for Ubuntu, Linux and Open Source by regularly publishing in local computer magazines
*** Co-operate with government sponsored OSS community activities (http://osscontest.blogspot.com/ ,http://osscontest.ocg.at/)
